title: About sticking picture on the model.

content.raw:
Recently, I need to stick a picture on my model. I check the existing model. I am very curious about how is this picture stuck on the model (2nd picture). For example, how does the sign of "GAS STATION"  in the picture find its corresponding position in the model?  What is the method to create such a picture that can find the corresponding position in the model?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47413096/61230929-98de1880-a75d-11e9-8ee2-fa6a62593621.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47413096/61231274-6aad0880-a75e-11e9-9bb1-b269d6d1632b.png)
